item.title: Creating a FunPK Area!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

::mypos basically tells your positions of both X axis and Y axis.

The first position is the X axis (horizontal) and the second is the Y axis (vertical).

If you’re at X 1234 and Y 3210, ::mypos command would give you 1234, 3210

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a FunPK Area!
item.dc:creator: @Leggyownz Leggyownz
item.description:
@Leggyownz wrote:

client.java:16938: error: cannot find symbol
if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLe
vel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !
inFunPK()){

^
symbol: method inFunPK()
location: class client
client.java:18872: error: cannot find symbol
if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunPK() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPit
Room() && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - death
Timer >= 1500) {
^
symbol: method inFunPK()
location: class client
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

I can post snippets of my code if needed but i couldn’t figure this out for the life of me

Nevermind i figured out what it was, it was just capitalization errors. But even with 0 errors i can’t attack or anything else
